Like many people who move, I was in a rush to furnish my place on a budget. At the time, I didn’t care if the pieces were low-quality — the cheaper, the better. I just needed something to sleep on! In hindsight, that turned out to be a big mistake. A lot of the cheap furniture I bought ended up being just that — cheap. And the quality was a reflection of the price. While I still believe you can score quality pieces for less, I definitely didn’t do my homework this time around.

The result? A broken bed frame in less than six months. Not surprising, considering how painful it was to assemble. Thankfully, as a shopping writer, I have the chance to test furniture, and when Casper offered me the opportunity to try its Upholstered Bed Frame a few years ago, I jumped at the chance. It’s been everything my old frame wasn’t: durable, non-creaky, and luxuriously comfortable. And while I might be comparing night and day, I’m so grateful to still have this bed frame now (and not have to assemble another until I move again)!

A Quick Look at the Casper Upholstered Bed Frame

  • Stylish, fabric-wrapped design
  • Made of wood and steel for support
  • Available in three upholstery options
  • One-tool assembly for easy setup 
  • Useful ledge around the perimeter 

Design Features That Stand Out

When I first spotted Casper’s Upholstered Bed Frame, I immediately thought, “Wow, I love the simplicity.” The platform bed features cozy, woven fabric upholstery and a sleek, low-profile design that fits perfectly in my bedroom. Since I have two windows above my bed, I needed something that wouldn’t overwhelm the space, and this frame’s minimalist style works perfectly. The design even extends an extra two inches around the perimeter, which is great for resting my feet or keeping my phone close while it charges. I chose the “natural” shade, but honestly, any of the three color options would complement a variety of bedroom styles.

How It Performed

When this bed frame was delivered, I was living in an upstairs apartment with a narrow hallway and plenty of sharp corners to navigate. As you can imagine, getting furniture through there was a major challenge — it was almost impossible to maneuver anything large. So, when I saw the bed frame arrive in a long, narrow box, I knew it was going to be a struggle. Still, we managed to get the 100-pound box into the apartment (it took two people) and into my bedroom. I’m honestly just relieved that part is over; since then, everything else has gone smoothly.

Assembly was a breeze compared to my previous bed frame. It required only one person, one tool, and about 30 minutes of my time (though, in reality, it probably took me an hour since I like to reread instructions to make sure I’m getting everything right). But, in the end, it turned out great. The steel frame has held up wonderfully with no creaks, and its low profile was perfect for my bedroom. The upholstery still looks as good as new, and no, I haven’t washed it once (even though the directions recommend it) so no pressure there. Two years later, the solid, creak-free design is still going strong, lasting longer than any bed frame I’ve had before (and that’s saying something!). 

What I Loved

  • Silent and Sturdy: Made from a solid wood and steel frame, this bed has held up for over two years (and I have no plans to replace it). Unlike my old, creaky bed frame, this one is silent, ensuring a comfortable night’s sleep.
  • Upholstery Finish: Can you really love a bed frame without appreciating its style? The upholstery finish on this frame added a cozy touch to my bedroom, and it has remained bright and vibrant even after all these years.
  • Easy Assembly: One tool and a quick, one-person setup was a breath of fresh air after the hassle of getting this frame up my stairs.

Good to Know

Casper also sells attachable headboards, like this Drift Attachable Headboard, which matches perfectly. So, if you’re looking for a more complete bedroom setup, the option is there!

Should you buy the Casper Upholstered Bed Frame?

All in all, the Casper Upholstered Bed Frame is a stellar pick. In particular, I’d recommend it to those looking for:

  • A reliable bed that’s going to last for years, even between moves
  • A durable bed frame with a luxe look and neutral color options
  • A bed frame with easy instructions that one person can set up

Where to Buy the Casper Upholstered Bed Frame

The Upholstered Bed Frame is available exclusively at Casper in Natural, Midnight, and Gray.
